title: Lemon Italian Ice
full_text:
Lemon Italian Ice
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
30 mins
Churning/Freezing Time
4 hrs 30 mins
Total
4 hrs 35 mins
Serves
6 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
cup
(about
7
ounces
)
sugar
4
cups
boiling water
1
cup
fresh juice
and
1
tablespoon
zest
from about
8
whole
lemons
2
teaspoons
lemon extract
Directions
In a large bowl or measuring cup, dissolve sugar in boiling water. Whisk in lemon juice, lemon zest, and lemon extract. Refrigerate and chill completely, 2 to 3 hours.
Add mixture to ice cream maker and prepare according to manufacturer's directions until icy crystals form and you have a thick, slush-like mixture. Transfer to a large bowl or container and return to freezer to freeze to desired degree of firmness, about 2 to 3 hours.
Special Equipment
Ice cream maker
